Package com.progmethgame.server

Class ServerRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.progmethgame.server.ServerRuntime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, ServerContext, ServerBusListener
    public class ServerRuntime
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerBusListener, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, ServerContext
    Manage the game state. This class processes the client's event, manage the entities, calculate the physic.
